name: Swap the Dragon Blocks
description:
A logic puzzle about moving dragons around!
You need to move dragon blocks, one by one, to form a line of three or more to make them disappear.
You have a limited number of moves to solve the level.

WARNING:Insanely Addictive!

- Fine HD graphics
- Exciting music theme
- 72 levels with more to come

Special thanks goes to translators!!!
